extendedInfo.description: â New York Times âTop 10 Must-Have Appâ, Winner: TechCrunch Crunchies, Mashable Awards and the Webbys. â  Evernote is an easy-to-use, free app that helps you remember everything across all of the devices you use. Stay organized, save your ideas and improve productivity. Evernote lets you take notes, capture photos, create to-do lists, record voice reminders--and makes these notes completely searchable, whether you are at home, at work, or on the go. Key Features:- Works with Evernote Business: Capture, browse, search, and share Business Notes and Business Notebooks from your smartphone or tablet.- Sync all of your notes across the computers and devices you use- Create and edit text notes, to-dos and task lists  - Save, sync and share files  - Search for text inside images- Organize notes by notebooks and tags- Email notes and save tweets to your Evernote account- Connect Evernote to other apps and products you use- Share notes with friends and colleagues via Facebook and Twitterâ Premium feature: take notebooks offline to access them anytime â Premium feature: allow others to edit your notebooksâ Premium feature: add a PIN lock to your Evernote appHere are some ways to use Evernote for your personal and professional life:- Research smarter: snap photos of whiteboards and books- Take meeting and class notes, draft agendas and research notes- Plan a trip: keep track of travel plans, plane tickets and passports- Organize and save recipes; search by ingredients later- Create a grocery list or task list and check things off as you go- View web pages saved in Evernote on your desktop- Capture ideas and inspiration on the go- Access files and notes you create on your phone from your desktop- Keep track of products and prices for comparison shopping purposes- Keep finances in order: save receipts, bills and contracts- Reduce paper clutter by taking snapshots of restaurant menus, business cards and labels- Use Evernote as part of your GTD system to help you stay organized- To get the most out of your Evernote experience, download it on all of the computers and phones that you use.Evernote is available on any computer, phone and tablet device.More information about permissions at:http://evernote.com/privacy/data_usage.phpLearn more: http://www.evernote.com/about/getting_started/

reviews.title: Umair
reviews.comment: Great application which not only makes my notes accessible everywhere without spending a penny but also provides a one-note like convenience. I can\'t imagine my smart phone and tab without this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: very useful app
reviews.comment: Really great for organizing all your documents, web content, links, tags and lot more in a very easy way. Also very easy to sync to all your devices. Could use a little more options in reading part, otherwise it is perfect.
reviews.author: Anshul Vineet

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Very impressed with the ease of use of the app and how easy everything syncs. Looking to get premium. I only have one challenge and that is creating a new notebook on my tablet.
reviews.author: Derrick Delvon Ashby

reviews.title: Very pleased
reviews.comment: Evernote has been a great app to keep my checklists and ideas organized.   I appreciate the announcements telling what is new about the app. Still figuring it out, but have been very pleased with it thus far.
reviews.author: Shaun Gray

reviews.title: This is a fantastic software.
reviews.comment: This is a fantastic software. I just cant do without it. With all my notes accessible at any given time, it makes my job so much easier. I also love its user interface.
reviews.author: Adil Shah

reviews.title: Great note app
reviews.comment: I love evernote  it is very usable and syncs very easy with all my devices.  I would like to see on the app a way to hand write notes that would convert to text.  I know it has been done on other apps.  This option is available on desktop version.  This is the only reason I did not give it 5 stars
reviews.author: Chris Logsdon

reviews.title: Download :-)
reviews.comment: Very helpful and awesome note app. It\'s helps me keep everything organized and I love how it connects from my phone to my tablet to my computer. I recommend this app.
reviews.author: Dustin Mondel

reviews.title: Awesome App!
reviews.comment: I had to replace my phone and didn\'t have to worry about losing my notes. Also, you can take pictures within those notes which helped me with repairs.
reviews.author: Jose Alvarado

reviews.title: Love It!
reviews.comment: Just started using it. But it is awesome! Installed on both tablet and my PC, so no matter where i work everything is synced to the other device. And i can attach pics, and add audio notes. Great for my creative process. EVERNOTE, where have u been all my life ?!
reviews.author: Donnie Hollandale

reviews.title: GOTO application
reviews.comment: I use Evernote for anything I need to track and follow-up. Being able to access via web, phone or tablet makes it very convenient.
reviews.author: James Phillip

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great app that allowed me to access all the stuff I need at home and on the go. Happy that it syncs across so many platforms. Android, windows and blackberry
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: waaay too many updates...
reviews.comment: went from 5 glorious stars to 2 meh stars....and this last update is to thank for that - i did NOT like that it[the update] just opened the app without me doing so or me ok\'ing it.......... as nice as this is, i truly do not use it all that often... thinking about uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very good, and it keeps getting better. Integrate a proper task management module and I would pay proper money to use this.
reviews.author: Tom McGuinness

reviews.title: Just takes a little time to really learn well
reviews.comment: The only reason I didn\'t give it 5 stars is because I haven\'t used all the features and it takes some time to investigate...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a great tool for anyone do research on the web. Being open source many new tool are constantly being added for little or no money. I can\'t imagine not having something similar to this going forward.
reviews.author: Greg Jackson

reviews.title: Very usefull!
reviews.comment: This app works so well. I can share my info among all of my devices. Get it today.
reviews.author: Melvin Bradley

reviews.title: Excellent Application
reviews.comment: This is one of the best applications I have ever come across.  It far exceeds all others in its category.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Evernote
reviews.comment: This app is great a ton of free features. Hands down better than Inkpad .I sync my nexus 7 tablet and my galaxy 2 phone and I can still access all my stuff on the PC.Great app especially for a writer such as myself. Anyone who has to constantly jot down what pops into your head before its gone will understands this.Thank you for this great app  !!!
reviews.author: nathan tice

reviews.title: EVERNOTE
reviews.comment: There\'s a bit of a learning curve (that I\'m still on). Particularly helpful is the ability to have multiple notebooks and to input from phone/compute
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Evernote is my go-to app
reviews.comment: I use it for school, as a cook book, for journaling, I keep receipts on it,  and just all around capturing interesting stuff. I Love It!!!
reviews.author: Heidi Caslin
